numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This graph compares the chances of students to get accepted into a prestigious college.
2. The comparison is based on several requirements.
3. A test score is a requirement.
4. An economic status is a requirement.
5. A family status is a requirement.
6. Legacy students have a higher chance to get admitted to such a college than non-legacy students.
7. I wonder why this graph shows a decrease at some point.
8. The message is: No legacy means no college.
9. The title is: Advantage to be rich.
